Bold or unbold variable labels for fmt_uni_regression objects in Rmarkdown

bold_labels.fmt_uni_regression.Rd

Bold or unbold variable labels for fmt_uni_regression objects in Rmarkdown

# S3 method for fmt_uni_regression
bold_labels(x, ...)

Arguments

x

fmt_uni_regression object
...

further arguments passed to or from other methods

Examples

trial %>%
  fmt_uni_regression(
    method = "glm",
    y = "response",
    method.args = list(family = binomial),
    exponentiate = TRUE
  ) %>%
  bold_labels()
#> 
#> Variable                    N                           OR                          95% CI                      p-value                    
#> __Treatment Randomization__ 191                                                                                                            
#> Drug                                                    Ref.                                                                               
#> Placebo                                                 0.47                        0.26, 0.84                  0.012                      
#> __Age, yrs__                183                         1.00                        0.98, 1.02                  >0.9                       
#> __Marker Level, ng/mL__     183                         0.92                        0.65, 1.30                  0.6                        
#> __T Stage__                 191                                                                                                            
#> T1                                                      Ref.                                                                               
#> T2                                                      1.40                        0.63, 3.14                  0.4                        
#> T3                                                      0.63                        0.26, 1.50                  0.3                        
#> T4                                                      0.50                        0.22, 1.11                  0.089                      
#> __Grade__                   191                                                                                                            
#> I                                                       Ref.                                                                               
#> II                                                      0.60                        0.29, 1.25                  0.2                        
#> III                                                     0.76                        0.38, 1.51                  0.4
